message: Unless I'm totally missing the features, I'd really like to see group level search and an RSS feed for new topics.

I think Convore could be great for real-time and communication with users of our product.  Having an RSS feed would make it easy to integrate fresh content from customer discussions into our initial landing page so that customers are more likely to engage in more communication.
@swashbuck1r I'd love to have a widget but it's something we haven't had time to do yet either :D

I'm sure you have lots to do :).  An embeddable widget would also be nice as an easy way to integrate the communication directly into our site.  Perhaps the APIs will let me do that, but I haven't spent the engineering time for that
both those are good features that we're hoping to implement in the near future
It'll be hard to convince my team to drop IRC internally, but this is a great start for how I'd like to communicate with customers. Congrats on the launch.
